scripts.build:dev:win32: pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase" && pnpm dist
scripts.build:prod:linux:darwin: pnpm lint && mvn clean install -DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) -Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures) -DskipITs -Pno-showcase && pnpm dist
scripts.build:prod:win32: pnpm lint && pnpm powershell "mvn clean install `-DskipTests=$(build-env tests.run --not) `-Dmaven.test.failure.ignore=$(build-env tests.ignoreFailures) `-DskipITs `-Pno-showcase" && pnpm dist
scripts.dist: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && pnpm dist:sw
